EmailTemplate.name: CAS_Onekey_ReminderForApproval
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder For Approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear GDPR validator,
You are receiving this email because at least one GDPR erasure request required your attention.
The following case has been requested for erasure for more than 20 days and it is pending for your approval.
TABLE_CONTENT
Please proceed as soon as possible the above request.
This email is send by automated process, please do not reply.
IQVIA
